com.layers.app.data

Interface ScaleDataInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScaleDataService

    public interface ScaleDataInterface
    Contracts the respective data access service for dependency injection. Guarentees its functions are provided and available during runtime.
    See Also:
    ScaleDataService
